directions: Mix green onion, shallot, soy sauce, lime juice, seaweed, sesame seeds, sesame oil, peanut butter, and chile paste together in a bowl. Add tuna; toss gently to combine.
Cover tuna and chill for 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: 2 sashimi-grade ahi tuna steaks, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
title: Aloha Ahi Poke
